definition: tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten

sentences.english: On the supply side, tight lending remains the norm.
sentences.chinese: 在提供方面，嚴緊的出借仍然是標準”。
神開辦了一個嚴緊的學校。

sentences.english: He made narrow clerestory windows in the temple.
sentences.chinese: 又爲殿作了嚴緊的窗櫺。

sentences.english: Operation modes for both sewage side and sludge side were critically reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 渠務署嚴緊地檢討了污水及污泥的處理過程。

sentences.english: Now Jericho was tightly shut up because of the Israelites. No one went out and no one came in.
sentences.chinese: 耶利哥的城門因以色列人就關得嚴緊，無人出入。

sentences.english: The tobacco retail businessmen were strictly prohibit from buying cigarette to young men under 18.
sentences.chinese: 嚴緊各處銷售菸草的商人賣給18歲以下兒童香菸。
